attributes.action: pressurise the Libyan leadership to pay compensation to IRA victims and their families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is commonly known that Libya has provided supplies to the IRA, including semtex used in explosive devices.  In light of the thawing of relations with Libya, it is fair and just that they should now compensate the victims of IRA atrocities and their families.  This must extend beyond the current "provision of a dedicated foreign office team" to assist victims.  The full weight of the British Government should be used to pressurise Libya.
